articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: 'A Family Affair' Dethroned In Netflix's Top 10 List By A New Movie - Forbes
articles.description: Here's what new show has knocked A Family Affair off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list.
articles.content:
A Family Affair
Netflix
Netflix tends to rotate through its top movies pretty quickly with so many released and added, but A Family Affair did have at least a fair bit of time on top. Now, its been… [+2395 chars]
